project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Design the structure for the quiz questions and answers
Implement the game logic to ask questions and collect user responses
Calculate and keep track of the user's score as they answer questions
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests to ensure that the game logic works correctly
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure functionality
